long_description: Take shelter from cold winter weather with the stylish REI Quilted Aviator hat. Polyester exterior has a soft polyester satin lining in the crown that enhances warmth and wicks moisture away from your brow. Front flap and earflaps are lined with silky soft polyester faux fur for next-to-skin comfort. REI Quilted Aviator hat features polyester-insulated earflaps that offer protection from harsh winds; secure flaps around your chin or atop your head.
short_description: Take shelter from cold winter weather with the stylish REI Quilted Aviator hat.
